ENID_ALL.comment:
阻止所有爆炸破坏掉落物
 Prevent all explosions from destroying item entities

EBNB_ALL.comment:
阻止所有爆炸破坏方块
 Prevent all explosions from destroying blocks

ExplosionBreaksNoBlockList.comment:
阻止破坏方块的爆炸源列表
 List of explosion sources that no block destruction
 e.g. minecraft:bed; minecraft:respawn_anchor; minecraft:creeper

ExplosionNoItemDamageList.comment:
阻止破坏掉落物的爆炸源列表（由于一些原因，床和重生锚在此合并为respawn_blocks）
 List of explosion sources that no destroying item entities (Note: Bed and Respawn Anchor are merged as respawn_blocks due to technical reasons)
 e.g. respawn_blocks; minecraft:creeper; tacz:bullet
